text:
Provide fox extensions to specify rounded corners on block areas.

Please refer to [1], [2] and Bugzilla 49913 for details.

[1] http://wiki.apache.org/xmlgraphics-fop/RoundedBorders
[2] http://xmlgraphics.staging.apache.org/fop/trunk/extensions.html
